SageTVPlugin.Name: Install Disk Usage
SageTVPlugin.Description:
Install Disk Usage for SageTV 7. This plugin displays a small bargraph in the header indicating how much space is left on the drive where SageTV is installed.
To configure go to Setup->Detailed Setup->Customize and look for "Install Disk Usage" near the end of the list.
